description: The Spoons have been serving some some tasty East NC-style BBQ since 1963 from their famous brick & mortar location. Their smoked meats, homemade sides, and Southern hospitality have been rated as the best by About.com, and with the Spoon’s BBQ Food Truck, all of the above can also be enjoyed on the streets!You’ve gotta come out to this wonderful family-run truck and try their authentic BBQ Sandwiches, ribs, and platters- all slathered with their homemade vinegar based sauces. Their incredible sides include mustard based coleslaw, homemade hushpuppies, mac n’ cheese, (and so much more), all this grub great for any kind of event. If you want to make your taste buds swoon, come get some amazing food from Spoon’s BBQ Food Truck!
name: Spoon's BBQ Food Truck
